name: Snake Party (itch)
description:
You're snek and you've rented out the whole castle for your 30th birthday party and no one wants to come because everyone hates you so figure out how to please everyone so that they accept your invitation! 

Or you can just eat them and party alone

Also, secret pants island enough pants for everyone! 

By terry and robbie for an 8-hour game  jam, party music by J!

PC controls:  WASD for movement and arrow keys to invite, bite, hiss and grab
